articles.title: About this blog
articles.contents: This blog hosts the Data Visualisation Makeover assignments for ISSS608 Visual Analytics and Applications for Arnold Ng.

articles.description: Analysing Singapore's Merchandise Trade by Region/Market

1. Critique of the visualisation

Original data visualisation
1.1 Clarity
The axes ranges are not standardised across each graph in the grid. This makes it difficult to compare the trends and figures from each country with each other.
